headline: EQT (NYSE:EQT) Completes US$3 Billion Debt Exchange For New Notes Until 2048
summary: EQT Corporation (NYSE:EQT) experienced a 10.78% price increase over the last quarter, which coincided with significant financial restructuring. The company completed various debt financing moves, exchanging EQM Notes for new EQT Notes and cash, totaling billions in new issuances. These actions reflect a proactive approach to managing debt, potentially boosting investor confidence. Despite broader market declines, including a 5.6% drop in indices like the Nasdaq due to fears of a global trade...
